name: Executionner's Charm
effect: Generates 12 Chain Points when attacking a target that has Enraged
effect10: Recovers 50 Action Points when attacking an Enraged target

name: Gladiator's Charm
effect: Generates 12 Chain Points when using an ultimate
effect10: Increases Dual Attack Weakness Gauge damage by 1

name: Rogue's Charm
effect: Generates 10 Chain Points when an attack scrores a critical hit
effect10: Increases damage dealt against targets inflicted with break

name: Sage's Charm
effect: Generates 10 Chain Points when attacking with an advantageous element
effect10: Increases Weakness Gauge damage of attacks that target all ennemies by 1 (excluding Skill Chains)

name: Prophet's Charm
effect: Has a 100% chance to generate 16 Chain Points when a battle starts
effect10: Increases Weakness Gauge damage of Single Attacks by 1 (excluding Dual Attacks)

name: Saint's Charm
effect: Generates 10 Chain Points when using a non-attack skill
effect10: Increases Skill Chain Weakness Gauge damage by 1

name: Tactician's Charm
effect: Recovers 20 Action Points when attacking with an advantageous element
effect10: Recovers 30 Action Points when attacking with an advantageous element

name: Assassin's Charm
effect: Recovers 30 Action Points when using an ultimate
effect10: Recovers 45 Actions Points when using an ultimate

name: Mage's Charm
effect: Recovers 30 Action Points when attacking all enemies
effect10: Recovers 39 Action Points when attacking all enemies

name: Vanguard's Charm
effect: Recovers 50 Action Points when hit by an attack that targets all allies
effect10: Recovers 60 Action Points when hit by an attack that targets all allies

name: Undertaker's Charm
effect: Recovers 30 Action Points when killing an enemy
effect10: Recovers 45 Action Points when killing an enemy

name: Powerful Adventurer's Talisman
effect: Recovers 30 Action Points when using an ultimate

name: Sharp Adventurer's Talisman
effect: Generates 10 Chain Points when an attack scrores a critical hit
